metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12207 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.Description:
Improper invalidation for page table updates by a virtual guest operatingsystem for multiple Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service of the host system via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required
